ruleContent.content:
let domain = String(Get('url')).split(".")[1]; function addOptions(url, baseUrl, options) { let j = { "Referer": baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/, "") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { j.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, j); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function arrayToImg(arr, func, baseUrl, options) { let result = []; for (let item of arr) { let imgUrl = addOptions(item, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } result.push(imgTag); } return result.join("\n"); } function stringToImg(str, func, baseUrl, options) { let imgUrl = addOptions(str, baseUrl, options); let imgTag = ``; if (typeof func === "function") { imgTag = func(imgUrl); } return imgTag; } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { if (!urls[i].includes("coco_keys.json")){ url = urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'; } else { url = urls[i]; } let response = java.ajax(url); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi") || JSON.stringify(response).includes("C_DATA")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: 所有链接下载失败"; } function parseKeys() { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/cocomanhua.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js" ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_js}`); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; java.toast('\n\n' + jsBaseUrl); cache.put(`cache_js}`, jsBaseUrl); } function toAbsUrl(url) { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(url) ? url : jsBaseUrl.concat(url); } function loadJS(urls) { let scripts = ""; for (let url of urls) { let absoluteUrl = toAbsUrl(url); let content = java.ajax(absoluteUrl); let scriptTag = script(content); scripts += scriptTag; } return scripts; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; return java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"); } function fetchRemoteKeys() { let remoteUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/autoCI/cocokeys/coco_keys.json", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/autoCI/cocokeys/coco_keys.json", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/autoCI@cocokeys/coco_keys.json", ]; remoteKeys = load(remoteUrls)[0]; return remoteKeys; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let local_keys = null; function base64Decode(base64) { return java.base64Decode(base64) + ""; } let aes = { keys: null, retryNum: 2, saveKeys: function (keysString) { try { this.keys = JSON.parse(keysString); let localKeys = cache.get(`cache_keysString_${Get('url')}`); if (localKeys !== keysString) { cache.put(`cache_keysString_${Get('url')}`, keysString); return true; } } catch (e) { java.log(keysString); java.log("❎密钥解析错误！！"); } }, _aesDecrypt: function (key, word) { return java.createSymmetricCrypto("aes/ecb/pkcs7padding", key).decryptStr(word) + ""; }, decrypt: function (word, name) { if (this.keys && this.keys[name]) { for (let key of this.keys[name]) { try { return this._aesDecrypt(key, word); } catch {} } } if (this.retryNum-- > 0) { if ((this.retryNum == 2 && this.saveKeys(parseKeys())) || (this.retryNum == 1 && this.saveKeys(fetchRemoteKeys()))) { return this.decrypt(word, name); } } throw "❎解密失败，无法获取密钥！！"; } }; function decodeImage(src) { let C_DATA = src.match(/C_DATA\s*=\s*\S([\s\S]+?)['"]/); if (!C_DATA) { throw "❎图片数据C_DATA获取失败！！"; } C_DATA = aes.decrypt(base64Decode(C_DATA[1]), "C_DATA"); DEBUG && java.log(C_DATA); eval(C_DATA); let html = ""; if (!image_info.img_type) { let path = mh_info.enc_code2 ? aes.decrypt(base64Decode(mh_info.enc_code2), "enc_code2") : mh_info.imgpath; let totalImageCount = mh_info.enc_code1 ? aes.decrypt(base64Decode(mh_info.enc_code1), "enc_code1") : mh_info.totalimg; let servers = [mh_info.domain]; if (typeof __JS_READLINE !== "undefined") { if (__JS_READLINE.data && __JS_READLINE.data.length > 0) { servers.push(__JS_READLINE.data[0].domain); } else if (__JS_READLINE.domain) { servers.push(__JS_READLINE.domain); } } let server = mh_info.use_server === "" ? servers[0] : servers[0].replace(/^img/, `img${mh_info.use_server}`); let options = {}; let suffix = "jpg"; if (image_info.imgKey !== undefined && image_info.imgKey !== '' || image_info.keyType !== undefined && image_info.keyType !== '') { if (image_info.keyType === '0') { colakey = aes.decrypt(image_info.imgKey, "C_DATA"); } else { let colajsonUrls = ["https://qyyuapi.com/cola.json"]; for (let i = 0; i < colajsonUrls.length; i++) { try { let response = java.ajax(colajsonUrls[i]); colakey = JSON.parse(response)[image_info.keyType]; break; } catch (e) { java.log(`❎加载${colajsonUrls[i]}密钥文件错误`); } }; if (colakey == '' || colakey == null) { java.log(`❎远程密钥文件未更新，请30分钟后再试`); } } options = { "key": enc_webp_bytes_key = colakey, "headers": { "Cookie": `_tka_${mh_info.pageid}=${path};_tkb_${mh_info.pageid}=${totalImageCount}`, "Origin": Get('url') } }; suffix = "enc.webp"; } if (DEBUG) totalImageCount = 1; for (; mh_info.startimg <= totalImageCount; mh_info.startimg++) { let imgPath = `https://${server}/comic/${encodeURIComponent(path)}${String(mh_info.startimg).padStart(4, "0")}.${suffix}`; html += stringToImg(imgPath, null, baseUrl, options) + "\n"; } } else { let urls__direct = base64Decode(image_info.urls__direct).split("|SEPARATER|"); if (DEBUG) urls__direct.splice(0, 1); if (image_info.img_type === 1) { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, url => url + ".webp", baseUrl); } else { html = arrayToImg(urls__direct, null, baseUrl); } } return html; } (function () { if (local_keys !== null && local_keys !== '') { aes.keys = local_keys; } else if (cache.get('keysString') !== null && cache.get('keysString') !== '') { aes.saveKeys(cache.get('keysString')); } else { !DEBUG && aes.saveKeys(parseKeys()); aes.retryNum = 1; DEBUG && aes.saveKeys(fetchRemoteKeys()); } return decodeImage(src); })(); } else { '
'; }

let domain = "."; function addOptions(url, options) { let headers = { Referer: baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/,"") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { headers.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, headers); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function toImg(url, func, options) { let generateImgTag = (u) => ``; let generateHtml = (u, i, t) => typeof func == "function" ? generateImgTag(func(u, i, t)) : generateImgTag(u); return Array.isArray(url) ? url.map(generateHtml).join("\n") : generateHtml(url.toString()); } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { let response = java.ajax(urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: 所有链接下载失败"; } function parseKey(jsUrl) { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/manwa.js", "plugins/evalPacker.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js", ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get("decodeObfuscator"); if (!jsBaseUrl) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; cache.put("decodeObfuscator", jsBaseUrl); } String.prototype.toAbsUrl = function() { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(this) ? this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let origin = Get('url'); let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ? dataRsrc : ""; }) .filter(v => v !== ""); if (DEBUG) { imgs.splice(1); } var result = toImg(imgs, null, { headers: { origin: origin } }); result; } else { '
'; }

bookSourceComment: 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 效果自认为是不错的，就是慢，巨慢，分页多的章节可能获取文字就要几分钟，毕竟，要做过滤和处理。 凑合用吧兄弟们，后续暂时不准备修改了。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.1yydstxt234.com https://www.2yydstxt234.com/ https://www.3yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt226.com/ https://www.7yydstxt434.com/ https://www.8yydstxt234.com/ https://6yydstxt178.com/ 获取最新可用网址 大家可以根据自己的网络情况选一个最快的来用 替换👉源域名👈链接即可 注意版主一系各站点数据库并非完全同步，所以换了地址之后原有的小说如果追更就需要重新搜索。 建议用复制出来源换个名称再批量改源的方式来做。

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

function x(a, b) { result = String(result).replace(a, b); } //debug function d(debug) { java.log(debug); java.log(result); } //同时加载多章时，自动验证成功后有的页面加载失败时重新获取 if(/.*1234/.test(src)){ //重新设置正文解析内容 java.setContent(java.ajax(baseUrl)); } //获取正文内容 result = java.getString('.neirong@html'); //大概第四页正文有切割，需要调接口获取这一页剩余正文 if (/\$.post\('',{'j':'1'}/.test(src)) { result += java.ajax(String(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify({ "method": "POST", "body": "j=1" }))) } //d("正文"+baseUrl) //有问题修改下面正则 两个br标签换行显示 x(/((\s*)
\n?){2}/g,"

"); x(//g,""); try { // Aes解密 secret = src.match(/=\s*secret\(\s*['"](.+?)['"],[\s]*['"](.+?)['"],[^);]*?/); string = secret[1] code = java.md5Encode(secret[2]); iv = code.substring(0, 16); key = code.substring(16); //java.log(baseUrl + " Aes解密ok：" + code + "\n" + iv + "\n" + key) result = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(string); } catch (err) { try { // 乱序恢复 ns = java.base64Decode(src.match(/var ns='(.+?)';/)[1]).split(','); //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复ok") paragraphArr = result.split('

'); result = ""; for (i = 1; i <= paragraphArr.length; i++) { result += paragraphArr[ns[i] - ns[0]] + '

'; } } catch (err) { //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复Aes解密no") } } //初始化图片链接 x(/[\r\n]?[\t ]*]+>[\t ]*[\r\n]?/g, "#$1#"); //初始化字体格式的文字,匹配 x(/(.*?)<\/i>/g, function(str, p1) { //java.log(p1.charCodeAt().toString(16)); //返回16进制，例：p1= 返回格式#e800# return '#' + p1.charCodeAt().toString(16) + '#' }) //转换空格 x(/ /g, ' '); //初始化分段准备 x(/[\t  ]{2,2}/g, "　"); //去掉标签里的属性 x(/(\<|<)([^\>]*?)(\s| )[^\>]*(\>|>)/g, "<$2>"); //段落换行 x(/\s*(\n|)+\s*(　{2,})?/gi, "\r\n"); //去掉不需要的标签 x(/([\r\n　]*\<\/?([A-Za-z]*)?\>[\r\n　]*)/gi, ""); //引号替换 x(/‘/g, "『"); x(/’/g, "』"); x(/“/g, "「"); x(/”/g, "」"); if (/(Undefined|(^\s*$))/.test(result)) { result = "

" + result; } //d("正文"+baseUrl) "\r\n" + result + "hereispagebreak";

关掉图片显示可提升正文加载速度。

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookinfo_intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##^\d+\.}}･{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

	.replace(/名着/g,'名著')
	.replace(/着作/g,'著作')
	.replace(/先進/g,'先进')
	.replace(/状態/g,'状态')
	.replace(/號/g,'号')
	.replace(/縈/g,'萦')
	.replace(/[『「]/g,'“')
	.replace(/[』」]/g,'”')
	.replace(/。.*[❻６➅𝟨6Ϭ𝟔𝟼𝟞₆].*[９❾➈𝟫9(9s)९𝟡𝟿𝟗₉].*」/g,'。”')

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function parseComments(n){
  for(var c=[],e=0;e<n.length;e++){
    var o=n[e]; c.push("".concat(o.createrId.userName,"｜").concat(o.createdAt.slice(0,10),"\n评分：").concat("🌟".repeat(o.score),"\n评语：").concat(o.content.replace(/([\u4e00-\u9fa5])(?=\n|$)/,"$1……").replace(/([^。！？—…]{9}[。；！？—…]+”?)([\u4e00-\u9fa5][^。！？—…]{7})/g,"$1\n$2")))}
return c.join("\n————\n");}
var data = JSON.parse(result);
data=data.data.comments;
data.length == 0 ? '暂无评价！': parseComments(data);
</js>

ruleSearch.author: author##<[^<>]+>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
if(pageCount>1){pageCount=2};
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <pageCount; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=latest&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

ruleSearch.author: td.2@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
// 验证码处理 v2 by 酷安@靈狐
// 使用腾讯OCR请设置tx_cookie
// 腾讯OCR有次数限制
// 登录地址https://cloud.tencent.com/login?s_url=https%3A%2F%2Fcloud.tencent.com%2Fproduct%2Focr
// 如果获取不到相关cookie就上传图片识别

// 代码最佳运行环境是在书籍列表页
// 移植其他地方可能会出现bug
// 如果搜索会跳转详情页请完善书籍URL正则
// 滑到最下面传入参数需要更改

var ocr=true // 是否启用ocr，关闭后手动输入，对于手动输入请开启CookieJar或在请求头手动设置一个cookie（部分网站不适用）
var mode=0
/*
0:"百度_通用"
1:"百度_高精度
2:"百度_网络图片"
3:"腾讯_通用"
4:"腾讯_高精度"
5:"腾讯_手写"
6:"腾讯_英语"
*/
var save=false // 是否缓存验证码供多次使用

var toast_level=2
/*
	0:关闭toast弹窗
	1:显示错误消息
	2:显示全部
*/

var tx_cookie={
	'uin':'',
	'skey':'',
}
var header=source.header||''
header=JSON.parse(header!=''?header:'{}')
function concat(o,split){
	let result=''
	for(i in o){
		let v=o[i]
		v=v&&'='+java.encodeURI(v)||''
		result+=result==''&&i+v||split+i+v
	}
	return result
}
tx_cookie=String(concat(tx_cookie,';'))
var Ocr={
tencent:function(base64,mode){
	let extra,params,action,data,body,res,json
	extra={
	 "LanguageType":"en",
		//"IsPdf":true,
		"ImageBase64":"data:image/jpeg;base64,"+base64
	}
 params={
		"ToModule":"ocr",
		"Extra":JSON.stringify(extra)
	}
 action=[
  'GeneralBasicOCR',
  'GeneralAccurateOCR',
  'GeneralHandwritingOCR',
  'EnglishOCR'
 ]
 params.ToAction=action[mode||0]
 body=JSON.stringify(params)
 data={
		"Action":"OcrDemo",
		"CloudEnv":"Formal",
		"Region":"ap-guangzhou",
		"Params":JSON.stringify(params)
		}
	body=JSON.stringify(data)
	res=java.post('https://ocr.smartform.cloud.tencent.com/ocr/forward/cloud',body,{cookie:tx_cookie})
		json=JSON.parse(res.body()).Response
		data=json.Data
		let result=''
		if(data){
			json=JSON.parse(data).Response.TextDetections
			for(i in json){
				result+=json[i].DetectedText
			}
		}else{
			this.msg=json.Error.Message
		}
		return result
},
baidu:function(base64,mode){
	let data,body,type,url,res,json
	data={
		image:'data:image/jpeg;base64,'+base64,
		image_url:null,
		type:'https://aip.baidubce.com/rest/2.0/ocr/v1/',
		detect_direction:false,
		language_type:'ENG'
		}
		type=[
		 'general_basic',
		 'accurate_basic',
		 'webimage'
		]
		data.type=data.type+type[mode||0]
		body=concat(data,'&')
		let result=''
		url='https://ai.baidu.com/aidemo'
		res=java.post(url,body,{'referer':url})
		json=JSON.parse(res.body())
		if(json.errno==0){
		 json=json.data.words_result
		 for(i in json){
			 result+=json[i].words
		 }
		}else{
			this.msg=json.msg
		}
		return result
},
get:function(base64){
	let result
 if(mode<3){
 	 result=this.baidu(base64,mode)
 	}else{
 		result=this.tencent(base64,mode-3)
 	}
 	if(this.msg){
 		java.log(this.msg)
 		if(toast_level>0){
 			java.toast(this.msg)
 		}
 		this.msg=null
 	}
 return result
 }
}
function imgToBase64(imgUrl){
	let res=org.jsoup.Jsoup.connect(imgUrl).ignoreContentType(true).ignoreHttpErrors(true).execute()
	header['cookie']=String(concat(res.cookies(),';'))
	let base64=Packages.cn.hutool.core.codec.Base64.encode(res.bodyAsBytes())
	return base64
}
function Url(u){
	if(!u.match('^http')){
		u = source.key+'/'+u
	}
	u = u.match(/(https?:\/\/)(.+)/)
	u = u[1]+u[2].replace(/\/+/,'/')
	return u
}
function auto(o){
	let base64,yzm,msg,body,res
	if(save&&try_times==0){
		yzm=cache.get(Url('yzm'))
		let temp=cache.get(Url('cookie'))
		if(temp){
		 header.cookie=temp
		}
	}
	if(!yzm){
	 if(ocr){
	  base64=imgToBase64(Url(o.img))
	  yzm=Ocr.get(base64).replace(/[^\w]/g,'')
	  if(yzm!==''){
	   msg='识别验证码：'+yzm
	   java.log(msg)
	   if(toast_level>1){
	    java.toast(msg)
	   }
	  }
	 }else{
		 yzm=java.getVerificationCode(Url(o.img))
		 let t=cookie.getCookie(source.key)
		 if(t&&t!=''){
		 	 header.cookie=t
		 	}
	 }
	}
	cache.delete(Url('yzm'))
	cache.delete(Url('cookie'))
	if(save){
		cache.put(Url('yzm'),yzm)
		cache.put(Url('cookie'),header.cookie)
	}
	for(i in o.data){
		if(!o.data||o.data[i]==''){
			o.data[i]=yzm
		}
	}
	body=concat(o.data,'&')
	method=o.method.toLowerCase()
	if(method=='post'){
	 res=java.post(Url(o.action),body,header)
	}else{
		res=java.get(Url(o.action+'/?')+body,header)
	}
	let jump=res.header("Location")
	jump=jump&&Url(jump)
 if(jump){
  	// 主要用在动态获取更新html，不需要可直接
  	// result='验证码'
 	 result=java.ajax(jump)
 	 // 该判断用在搜索列表规则时处理搜索跳转详情页
	 if(jump.match(source.bookUrlPattern)){
		 java.put('src',result)
		 source.bookUrlPattern=''
		 info=source.bookInfoRule.init
		 tocUrl=source.bookInfoRule.tocUrl
		 js="<"+"js>book.setBookUrl('"+jump+"');java.get('src')</"+"js>"
		 source.bookInfoRule.init=js+info
		 if(!tocUrl||tocUrl==''){
		 	 source.bookInfoRule.tocUrl="@js:'"+jump+"'"
		 	}
		 //toc=source.tocRule.chapterList
		 //source.tocRule.chapterList=js+toc
		 result=''
	 }
 }else{
 	 result=res.body()
 	}
	return result
}
max_try=5
try_times=0
while(result.match('验证码')){
 img=java.getString('img@src')
 input=java.getElement('input')
 data={}
 for([i,node] of Object.entries(input)){
		data[node.attr('name')]=node.attr('value')
	}
	u=java.getString('form@action')
 result=auto({
  action:u,
	 method:'post',
	 img:img,
	 data:data
	})
	// 设置解析为新的html
	java.setContent(result)
	/*上面是动态获取例子，以下是手动填入例子
	auto({
		action:"gut.php", // 提交数据地址
		method:'post', // 提交方式
		img:'captcha.php', // 验证码图片
		data:{ // 提交参数键值对
			search:'系统', // 搜索关键字
			captcha:'' // 识别为空的关键字为验证码
	 }
	})
	搜索关键字不从网页获取就用java.put('key',key)和java.get('key')
	已经很简单了，再不会打屁屁
	*/
if(try_times>=max_try){break}
try_times+=1
}
result
</js>

	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";

	h += x.charAt(r);
}

sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
